remarks:
An equivalent expression for double existence.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 30-Sep-2018.) 

---

 An equivalent expression for double existence.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2005.)
statement:
2exsb $p |- ( E. x E. y ph <-> E. z E. w A. x A. y ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> ph ) ) $.
$d ph w z $.
$d w y z $.
$d x y z $.
